name: 2021 6th International Workshop on Pattern Recognition
content: Publication: All accepted papersï¼Œafter registered and presented, will be published into Conference Proceedings by SPIE, and submitted for Web of Science Conference Proceedings Citation Index Science, Scopus, Ei Compendex, etc. IWPR 2016-2020 conference proceedings were published by SPIE and indexed by Ei Compendex and Scopus.
